com.asascience.ncsos.outputformatter

Class DescribeSensorFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.asascience.ncsos.outputformatter.DescribeSensorFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SOSOutputFormatter

    public class DescribeSensorFormatter
extends Object
implements SOSOutputFormatter
    "sensorML/1.0.1" Class that formats the output for describe sensor requests. Holds an instance of w3c document model for printing the xml response following the "sensorML/1.0.1" standard.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    SCowan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DescribeSensorFormatter()
      Creates a new formatter instance that uses the sosDescribeSensor.xml as a template (found in the resources templates folder)
      DescribeSensorFormatter(String uri, String query)
      Creates a new formatter instance that uses the sosDescribeSensor.xml as a template (found in the resources templates folder)

      • DescribeSensorFormatter

        public DescribeSensorFormatter(String uri,
                       String query)
        Creates a new formatter instance that uses the sosDescribeSensor.xml as a template (found in the resources templates folder)
        Parameters:
        uri - the uri of the request (used to construct hrefs for components
        query - the query of the request (used to construct hrefs for components)

        public void AddDataFormattedStringToInfoList(String dataFormattedString)
        Description copied from interface: SOSOutputFormatter
        Adds data from a formatted string to some container defined in the individual formatters.
        Specified by:
        AddDataFormattedStringToInfoList in interface SOSOutputFormatter
        Parameters:
        dataFormattedString - a csv string that usually follows the format of key=value,key1=value1,key2=value2,etc 'value' can be csvs as well, allowing for multiple values per key

      • setSystemId

        public void setSystemId(String id)
        Accessor function for setting the system id in the sml:System node
        Parameters:
        id - usually a string following the format "station-[station_name]" (or sensor)

      • setDescriptionNode

        public void setDescriptionNode(String description)
        Accessor function for setting the description text of the gml:description node
        Parameters:
        description - usually the description attribute value of a netcdf dataset

      • deleteDescriptionNode

        public void deleteDescriptionNode()
        Removes the gml:description node from the xml document

      • setIdentificationNode

        public void setIdentificationNode(String[] names,
                         String[] definitions,
                         String[] values)
        Accessor for setting the sml:identification node with Attributes from the station/sensor Variable. The parameters are expected to have the same lengths as one another.
        Parameters:
        names - collection of names from the Variable's Attributes
        definitions - collection of definitions for the name-value pairs (the sml:Term of the Attribute)
        values - collections of the values of the Variable's Attributes

      • deleteIdentificationNode

        public void deleteIdentificationNode()
        Removes the sml:identification node from the xml document

      • addToClassificationNode

        public void addToClassificationNode(String classifierName,
                           String definition,
                           String classifierValue)
        Accessor for setting the sml:classification node in the xml document
        Parameters:
        classifierName - name of the station classification (eg 'platformType')
        definition - sml:Term definition of the classification
        classifierValue - value of the classification (eg 'GLIDER')

      • deleteClassificationNode

        public void deleteClassificationNode()
        Removes the sml:classification node from the xml document

      • addContactNode

        public void addContactNode(String role,
                  String organizationName,
                  HashMap<String,HashMap<String,String>> contactInfo)
        Accessor method to add a contact node to the sml:System node structure. Most information is gathered from global Attributes of the dataset
        Parameters:
        role - the role of the contact (eg publisher)
        organizationName - the name of the orginization or individual
        contactInfo - info for contacting the...um...contact

      • deleteContactNodeFirst

        public void deleteContactNodeFirst()
        Removes the first contact node instance from the xml document

        Parameters:

        public void setLocationNode(String stationName,
                   double[] coords)
        Accessor method for adding a gml:Point node to the sml:location node in the xml document
        Parameters:
        stationName - name of the station
        coords - lat, lon of the station's location

      • setLocationNodeWithBoundingBox

        public void setLocationNodeWithBoundingBox(String[] lowerPoint,
                                  String[] upperPoint)
        Accessor method for adding a gml:boundedBy node to the sml:location node in the xml document
        Parameters:
        lowerPoint - lat, lon of the lower corner of the bounding box
        upperPoint - lat, lon of the upper corner of the bounding box
